contents.name: C
contents.description: General-purpose programming language developed primarily by Dennis MacAlistair Ritchie at AT&T Bell Labs.
contents.features:
Languages frequently used in the development of embedded software
Often used to learn the basics of programming at university
Exploded into prominence when UNIX, originally written in assembly, was rewritten in C
contents.pros: Fast execution speed due to translation into native machine language
contents.cons: High degree of difficulty e.g. pointer management
